https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kpPMOPYy8OkOQo6smPR3SRQHfS5.jpg Inspired by real events, “Bestia” enters the life of a secret police agent in the military dictatorship in Chile. The relationship with her dog, her body, her fears and frustrations, reveal a macabre fracture in her mind and a country. Bestia
